review: Well dayz if there is one thing to know about dayz is that if you have 'my leg is painful' or something along those lines dont go up ACT or Firestation stairs and dont run out door ways their my 2 most helpful tips and number 3 is dont rage when your shot beacause 85% of the time every one KOS so yea.Things needed 1. More guns not 100 pistols 2. Vehicles 3. Better hacking/exploiting protection4. Heroes and Bandit skins5. Being able to grow moostaches Over all dayz is a good game for $30 even if it does need alot more.9/10 would bang
